entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow mixed with rain overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
